resources.string: Please select at least one day
This permission is required for notifications. Please enable it in the app settings.
Permission is required to enable accurate alarms. You can enable it in the software.
It\'s a great day to say kind words!
This is empty for now, create a new reminder

string-array.name: compliments_women
string-array.item: You look absolutely stunning today!
Your smile lights up the world!
You are incredibly talented!
It’s always a pleasure to talk to you!
Your kindness makes the world a better place!
You have amazing strength!
You inspire everyone around you!
Being with you makes me want to be better!
You make the world brighter!
You know how to support in tough moments!
Your energy is so uplifting!
You always know how to cheer people up!
You are a true star!
Your style is amazing!
You have an exceptional sense of humor!
Being with you makes me laugh until I cry!
You are unique and one of a kind!
You are so caring and attentive!
Your kindness knows no bounds!
You are the perfect example of feminine strength and beauty!
You light up everything around you just by being there!
Your eyes shine like stars!
Your confidence is inspiring!
You are the embodiment of tenderness and beauty!
You are a true muse to all of us!
Your smile can warm even the coldest day!
With you, any task feels easy!
Your presence makes the world a better place!
You are the epitome of elegance and grace!
Your ideas are always so creative and unique!
You inspire greatness in others!
You are beautiful not only on the outside but on the inside too!
You are full of surprises and mysteries!
You harmoniously combine strength and tenderness!
You have a unique ability to find positivity in any situation!
Being with you is always interesting and fun!
You bring so much joy into this world!
You are a true role model!
You are a true queen!
Your sense of style is impeccable!
You always see the best in people!
You are incredibly wise and insightful!
You are a wonderful listener and conversationalist!
You inspire others to act in the best way possible!
You turn ordinary moments into something magical!
You always bring light to any group you’re in!
You make the world cozier and warmer!
You see the beauty in the little things!
With you, every event becomes a celebration!
You have incredible magnetism!
You are the embodiment of harmony and coziness!
Being with you is easy and pleasant!
Your bravery is inspiring!
You possess a special grace!
Your eyes are so expressive!
You are always so charming!
You know how to create comfort around you!
You are the sweetest person I know!
Your voice is like music to the ears!
You have a strong and kind heart!
Your love for life is inspiring!
With you, I feel truly alive!
You find joy in the little things!
You are a true miracle!
You radiate so much warmth!
You are a true romantic!
Your smile brightens my world!
You deserve only the best in life!
You fill the world with light!
You make my days brighter!
You always find joy in every day!
You are an inspiration!
You are a source of light and joy!
With you, I feel happy!
You can make any day better with just one look!
You have the power to change the world for the better!
You bring so much happiness to everyone around you!
You carry an immense inner strength within you!
Your smile makes everything around you brighter!
Every moment with you is unique!
You are the epitome of coziness and warmth!
You give me inspiration!
You are full of surprises and unexpected delights!
You make me happier every day!
You are an amazing person!
You are my muse!
You are like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day!
You are full of incredible strength and grace!
You always find a way out of any situation!
You bring so much happiness into this world!
You have true feminine wisdom!
You always look stylish and fashionable!
You make the world a little bit better!
You are always caring and attentive!
You radiate confidence!
You are my pride and joy!
You light up my life with your smile!
You give my life meaning!
Every day with you is special!
You are a true diamond that shines in the dark!
You possess a unique charm!
Your passion for life is inspiring!
You always find the right words!
You make me feel important!
You have a fine sense of tact!
With you, the world feels calmer!
You turn challenges into opportunities!
You are my brightest star!
Your love for people is impressive!
You always understand me without words!
You make my life fuller!
You bring me joy with every word you say!
You always support me when I need it!
You have exquisite taste!
You notice the beauty even in ordinary things!
You add magic to every moment!
With you, I can truly be myself!
You are a true rarity in this world!
You make every meeting unforgettable!
You know how to give warmth just because!
Your generosity of spirit is amazing!
You always find the strength for a new victory!
You make the world better just by being here!
You inspire me to become better!
You are so extraordinary and interesting!
Every day with you is filled with meaning!
You are truly a unique person!
You know how to listen and understand!
You are like a sunbeam on a cloudy day!
You inspire me to be braver!
You are like music for the soul!
You bring harmony to my life!
Your advice is always so wise and helpful!
You are a true gift from fate!
Your tenderness and strength are a unique combination!
Being with you is always easy and pleasant!
You always find the best in every person!
You are like a cozy place that I always want to return to!
You always know how to support!
You are so sweet and caring!
You bring happiness into the lives of everyone around you!
You are an amazing creation of nature!
You are a true beauty!
You deserve only the best!
You always look incredible!
You radiate warmth and care!
You are truly a heroine in my life!
You are the embodiment of perfection!
You are amazing: your sincerity and strength of character make every moment spent with you awe-inspiring.
You are like a bright star that lights up the darkest path and helps believe in the best.
When you are near, I feel that I can overcome any difficulties — your faith in me lifts me up!
Your kindness knows no bounds, and that makes you truly unique!
You notice the little things that most would miss, and that quality of yours makes the world special.
Every conversation with you is like a real adventure — you perceive everything around you so subtly and wisely!
You bring harmony and peace wherever you go, like a breath of fresh air in the hustle of the day.
You have a magical ability to listen — with you, I feel heard and understood like never before.
Each of your smiles lights up the day and seems to invite into a world full of warmth and sincerity.
With you, I feel more alive, inspired, and full of ideas — your energy is contagious to everyone around.
Your strength and tenderness blend so harmoniously that it sometimes feels like you are a work of art.
You can show beauty even in the simplest things, making me look at the world differently.
You are one of those people with whom it\'s enough to just be silent and enjoy the moment.
You create comfort wherever you are, and that is a rare and beautiful quality.
Every word you say is filled with kindness and warmth, and I always feel better after talking to you.
You are the embodiment of harmony and tenderness, and looking at you, I want to be kinder and more attentive to the world.
Your confidence inspires me to become better and reach new heights.
You bring a sense of coziness and comfort into my life that cannot be faked — it\'s your true gift.
Your support is invaluable to me: you are like a bridge that always leads to the right decision.
You are amazingly wise, and I am always curious to know your perspective on any situation — it\'s full of insights.
When I\'m with you, I always feel sincerity and purity, which are so lacking in the modern world.
You know how to inspire, and that inspiration comes from the heart — your sincerity always wins people over.
You are like a spring sunbeam, bringing warmth and hope even on the gloomiest days.
With you, time flies unnoticed, because every minute is filled with sincerity and joy.
You have a special talent for creating real connections with people, and that is priceless.
Your kindness and care make the world a better place, and I am proud to know you.
You are one of those people who leave a mark on hearts — your soul is incredibly beautiful.
With you, I can talk about anything, and I always feel that our connection is special.
You are the embodiment of femininity and wisdom, and I often wonder how you manage to combine everything so harmoniously.
You bring so much meaning and joy into my life that every day spent with you becomes a celebration.
Your smile is like the sun after rain, always bringing warmth and light.
You have an incredible ability to create a world around you full of peace and comfort.
Your energy charges others with positivity, and I never get tired of being around you.
You know how to see light in the simplest things, and that makes me believe in miracles.
You are an inspiration to many, and I am happy that you are in my life.
Your faith in the best always inspires me to overcome all difficulties and keep moving forward.
You know how to give joy so sincerely that it\'s impossible not to notice.
You remind me that everything is possible in this world if you keep the faith and stay true to yourself.
Your generosity of soul has no limits, and I cherish every moment spent with you.
You are the kind of person who inspires belief in good and light in this world.
Your eyes shine like stars, and every glance fills the soul with warmth and tranquility.
You have a special gift of being truly honest and open — that is a rare quality.
With you, I can dream about anything and not fear that my dreams won’t come true.
You are like a guiding star, always leading me to the brightest path.
You are so beautiful not only on the outside but also on the inside, and that makes you truly amazing.
Your words always support and inspire, and that is a gift not given to everyone.
You create an atmosphere of warmth and coziness even in the most mundane situations.
You are always sincere and open, and I feel truly happy being with you.
You know how to support and inspire, even when everything around seems complicated and confusing.
You are the brightest person I know, and that fills my life with meaning and joy.

string-array.name: compliments_men
string-array.item: You\'re handsome!
You\'re a real man!
You\'re amazing!
You\'re awesome!
You look great!
You\'re a real hero!
You\'re just cool!
You\'re the best!
You\'re strong and confident!
You\'re simply stunning!
You\'re a smart one!
You\'re chic!
You\'re fire!
You\'re the king!
You\'re a great guy!
You\'re my hero!
You\'re just class!
You\'re a handsome guy!
You\'re simply fantastic!
You have a strength that inspires.
Your confidence makes this world better.
With you, I can always count on support.
You inspire great deeds.
Your kindness makes you truly strong.
You know how to find a way out of any situation.
Your strength lies in calmness and confidence.
You bring confidence and light to any moment.
With you, it\'s always interesting and easy.
You\'re a role model.
Your care for others knows no bounds.
You always remain true to yourself.
Your words are always full of meaning and strength.
With you, it\'s easy and comfortable to be myself.
You give confidence just by being there.
You always know what needs to be done at the right moment.
Your energy inspires success in others.
You know how to support in the toughest moments.
You\'re someone who always inspires to do more.
You have a rare combination of strength and gentleness.
With you, it\'s not scary to move forward.
You\'re the embodiment of masculine wisdom.
You know how to be sincere in any situation.
Your confidence always inspires admiration.
You\'re an example of how to be strong and kind at the same time.
Your energy always creates an atmosphere of comfort.
You always know how to make a moment special.
Thank you for being in my life — with you, the world becomes brighter and more confident.
I\'m grateful that I can count on you.
Thank you for being here.
Thank you for being mine.
I\'m so grateful to fate that I met you.
With you, I feel safe — thank you for your confidence and care.
Thank you for your love and belief in me — you make this world better for me.
I appreciate every moment spent with you — thank you for being in my life.
Thank you for filling my life with meaning — you are truly a special person.
I am happy to be close to someone like you — thank you for your love and care.
You are incredibly strong: your determination and confidence inspire me and make me admire every one of your actions.
You are like a reliable anchor that stabilizes me and brings confidence in the toughest moments.
When you\'re around, I feel like I can overcome any obstacle — your support gives me strength and belief in myself!
Your kindness and care are immeasurable, and that makes you a true man I can trust.
You notice details that others might miss, and your attentiveness makes you unique in my eyes.
Every conversation with you is a new experience, you take everything around you so easily and confidently, and I always learn something!
You bring peace and confidence to any situation, like a support you can always rely on.
You have the gift of listening and understanding, with you I always feel heard and valued.
Your smile always warms me and reminds me that there is room for warmth and sincerity in life.
With you by my side, I feel more confident, stronger, and full of ideas — your energy is contagious to everyone around.
You are a combination of strength and masculine tenderness, and that makes you special in my eyes.
You can see the merits even in simple things, and you make me see the world from a different angle.
You are one of those people with whom you just want to sit in silence and enjoy the moment, you bring peace and serenity.
You create an atmosphere of comfort and safety wherever you are, and that is a true gift to me.
Every word you say is full of strength and meaning, and after talking to you, I always feel better and inspired.
You are the embodiment of masculine confidence and kindness, and next to you, I want to be the best version of myself.
Your confidence inspires me to reach new heights and achieve more with you.
You bring confidence and calm into my life that cannot be faked — it\'s your true gift.
Your support is invaluable to me: you are like a stone wall that I can always shelter behind and feel safe.
You are incredibly wise, and your view of the world is always full of depth and meaning — I am always interested to learn your perspective.
Next to you, there is always sincerity and reliability, things that are so lacking in everyday life.
You know how to inspire, and that inspiration comes from your inner calmness — your confidence always commands respect.
You are like the winter sun, bringing light and warmth even on the coldest days, it\'s always easier with you by my side.
Time flies unnoticed with you, because every minute is filled with energy, joy, and meaning.
You have a unique ability to establish real connections with people, and that is invaluable to me.
Your kindness and care make this world better, and I am proud to know you and be close to you.
You are one of those people who leaves a deep mark on the soul — your strength and wisdom mesmerize me.
With you, I can talk about anything, and I always feel that our connection is special and meaningful.
You embody masculine strength and intellect, and I often wonder how you manage to combine these qualities so harmoniously.
You bring so much meaning and inspiration into my life that every day spent with you becomes an important event for me.
Your smile is like a light in a dark tunnel, it always brings warmth and confidence when I need it.
You have an incredible ability to create an atmosphere of confidence and comfort around you, which makes me calm next to you.
Your energy fills me with positivity, and I never get tired of being around you — you are my source of inspiration.
You know how to find light even in the simplest things, and that makes me believe in the best.
You are an inspiration to many, and I am proud to be close to such an amazing person like you.
Your belief in the best always inspires me to move forward despite all the difficulties, because with you, it\'s easier to do.
You know how to give joy so sincerely that it cannot be ignored — it\'s always warm and fun with you.
You remind me that everything is possible in life if you keep the faith and stay true to yourself, and with you, I become stronger too.
Your generosity of soul knows no bounds, and I cherish every minute spent with you, it is priceless to me.
You are a person who inspires belief in goodness and light in this world, and I am proud to be a part of your world.
Your gaze fills my soul with warmth and calm — with you, I feel at ease.
You have a rare gift of being sincere and open — this is a true treasure for me, I feel I can be myself with you.
With you, I can dream about anything and not fear that dreams won\'t come true — with you, I believe in the future.
You are like a guiding star, always leading me to the better, and I am not afraid to follow you.
You are so beautiful not only on the outside but also on the inside, and that makes you truly amazing to me.
Your words always support and inspire, and that is a true gift, for which I am grateful.
You create an atmosphere of confidence and comfort even in the most ordinary situations, and I always feel at peace with you.
You are always sincere and open, and I feel truly happy with you by my side — you are my source of joy.
You know how to support and inspire, even when everything around seems confusing, you are always there, and I appreciate you for that.
You are the brightest person I know, and this fills my life with joy and meaning, it is always easy with you.
